section.title: luna::vulkan::commandPoolSubmitInfo Struct Reference

para.para: struct with all the submit info. this is the same except VkCommandBuffer* ->virtualCmdBuffer*. for more information: https://registry.khronos.org/vulkan/specs/1.3-extensions/man/html/VkSubmitInfo.html
